title: Real-life Task-based English Experiential Learning: Advanced English Education Using Robot Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English grammar and daily conversational skills
context.additional_context: Performing real-life tasks while interacting with a robot avatar in a digital environment.

learning_goals: Learners can complete three or more real-life simulation tasks (e.g., hotel check-in, business meetings) in English using robots in virtual environments
Learners can improve English communication skills by collaborating with peer learners on two or more project-based assignments using online collaboration tools
Learners self-reflectively write three reports applying Kolb’s experiential learning cycle (planning-action-reflection-conceptualization) to learning content
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
